description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府商务及经济发展局辖下的部门，是香港广播史上的首家广播机构，也是香港唯一的公共广播机构。
description.en: A department under the Commerce and Economic Development Bureau of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government. It is the first broadcasting station in Hong Kong's broadcasting history and the only public service broadcaster in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府的决策局之一，负责香港的工商业、旅游、创新科技、广播、电影及电讯等事务。香港电台是其辖下部门。
description.en: One of the policy bureaus of the Government of Hong Kong, responsible for commerce, industry, tourism, innovation and technology, broadcasting, film, and telecommunications. Radio Television Hong Kong is a department under its purview.

en: Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区的行政机关。
description.en: The executive authorities of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，政务主任出身，现任广播处长。
description.en: Hong Kong political figure, former administrative officer, current Director of Broadcasting.

description.zh-cn: 香港电台副广播处长。
description.en: Deputy Director of Broadcasting of RTHK.

description.zh-cn: 香港电台助理广播处长（电台及节目策划）。
description.en: Assistant Director of Broadcasting (Radio & Programming) of RTHK.

description.zh-cn: 香港电台助理广播处长（电视及机构业务）。
description.en: Assistant Director of Broadcasting (Television & Corporate Businesses) of RTHK.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府新闻、出版及宣传机构，曾一度接管香港电台。
description.en: The information, publishing, and publicity organization of the HKSAR Government, which once managed RTHK.

description.zh-cn: 香港电台首位华人兼女性广播处长。
description.en: The first Chinese and female Director of Broadcasting of RTHK.

en: Top Ten Chinese Gold Songs Award

description.zh-cn: 由香港电台举办的本地流行音乐选举，是香港乐坛四大颁奖礼之一。
description.en: A local popular music award organized by RTHK, one of the four major music awards ceremonies in the Hong Kong music industry.

nodes.id: 英国广播公司国际频道

zh-cn: 英国广播公司国际频道

description.zh-cn: 英国广播公司的国际广播机构，其节目曾由香港电台转播。
description.en: The international broadcasting arm of the BBC, whose programs were previously relayed by RTHK.

nodes.id: 中央人民广播电台香港之声

zh-cn: 中央人民广播电台香港之声

description.zh-cn: 中央广播电视总台对港澳地区广播的两套普通话节目之一，由香港电台第六台转播。
description.en: One of the two Mandarin radio services broadcast by China Media Group to Hong Kong and Macau, relayed by RTHK Radio 6.

description.zh-cn: 香港的广播及电讯业规管机构。
description.en: The regulatory body for the broadcasting and telecommunications industries in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府保安局辖下的纪律部队之一，负责香港的治安。
description.en: One of the disciplined services under the Security Bureau of the HKSAR Government, responsible for law and order in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院负责监督管理广播电视工作的直属机构。
description.en: A direct-administered institution of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for supervising and managing radio and television work.

description.zh-cn: 香港政务官，曾任广播处长。在其任内，港台多个节目被停播或抽起，多名主持人被解雇。
description.en: A Hong Kong administrative officer who served as Director of Broadcasting. During his tenure, several RTHK programs were suspended or pulled, and multiple hosts were dismissed.

description.zh-cn: 前香港电台广播处长，被认为是香港电台编辑自主的推手。
description.en: Former Director of Broadcasting of RTHK, considered a key figure in establishing the station's editorial independence.

description.zh-cn: 2019年在香港爆发的大规模社会运动，该运动后香港特区政府加强了对香港电台的管控。
description.en: A large-scale social movement that erupted in Hong Kong in 2019. Following the movement, the HKSAR government tightened its control over RTHK.

description.zh-cn: 前香港电台广播处长。
description.en: Former Director of Broadcasting of RTHK.

description.zh-cn: 香港政务官，曾任广播处长。
description.en: A Hong Kong administrative officer who served as Director of Broadcasting.

description.zh-cn: 香港传媒工作者，曾任广播处长，后被提早解约。
description.en: A Hong Kong media professional who served as Director of Broadcasting and whose contract was terminated early.

description.zh-cn: 前香港电台节目主持人，于2021年被解雇。
description.en: Former RTHK program host, dismissed in 2021.

description.zh-cn: 前香港电台节目主持人，于2021年被解雇。
description.en: Former RTHK program host, dismissed in 2021.

description.zh-cn: 前香港电台节目主持人，于2021年被撤换。
description.en: Former RTHK program host, replaced in 2021.

description.zh-cn: 香港商人及政治人物，首任香港特别行政区行政长官。
description.en: Hong Kong businessman and politician, the first Chief Executive of the HKSAR.

description.zh-cn: 香港电台制作的讽刺性时事节目，因多次批评政府及警方而引发争议，最终在2020年被暂停制作。
description.en: A satirical current affairs program produced by RTHK, which sparked controversy for its criticism of the government and police, and was eventually suspended in 2020.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府现任保安局局长，曾任警务处处长。
description.en: The current Secretary for Security of the HKSAR Government, formerly the Commissioner of Police.

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框和“隶属”部分，香港电台自2007年7月1日起隶属于商务及经济发展局。
description.en: According to the infobox and the 'Affiliation' section, RTHK has been subordinate to the Commerce and Economic Development Bureau since July 1, 2007.

description.zh-cn: 香港电台是香港特别行政区政府辖下的一个部门。
description.en: Radio Television Hong Kong is a department under the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 关婉仪自2025年1月6日起出任广播处长。
description.en: Yvonne Kwan Yuen-yee has been serving as the Director of Broadcasting since January 6, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 卫懿欣是香港电台的副广播处长。
description.en: Viola Wai Yi-yan is the Deputy Director of Broadcasting of RTHK.

position.zh-cn: 助理广播处长（电台及节目策划）

description.zh-cn: 李庆华是香港电台的助理广播处长，负责电台及节目策划。
description.en: Li Hing-wah is the Assistant Director of Broadcasting at RTHK, responsible for Radio & Programming.

position.zh-cn: 助理广播处长（电视及机构业务）
position.en: Assistant Director of Broadcasting (Television & Corporate Businesses)

description.zh-cn: 邝思燕是香港电台的助理广播处长，负责电视及机构业务。
description.en: Kwong Sze-yin is the Assistant Director of Broadcasting at RTHK, responsible for Television & Corporate Businesses.

description.zh-cn: 1951年至1954年间，香港电台的广播工作由政府新闻处（当时称政府公共关系处）接管。
description.en: From 1951 to 1954, broadcasting work at RTHK was managed by the Government Information Services Department (then known as the Government Public Relations Office).

description.zh-cn: 张敏仪于1986年至1999年担任广播处长，是首位华人兼女性广播处长。
description.en: Cheung Man-yee served as the Director of Broadcasting from 1986 to 1999, being the first Chinese and female director.

description.zh-cn: 在香港沦陷时期，香港电台的台号被更改为“香港放送局（JPHA）”，英语广播一度停顿并改由日语广播。
description.en: During the Japanese occupation of Hong Kong, RTHK's call sign was changed to 'Hong Kong Broadcasting Station (JPHA)', and English broadcasting was suspended and replaced by Japanese broadcasting.

description.zh-cn: 香港电台于1978年创办了“十大中文金曲”选举。
description.en: RTHK founded the 'Top Ten Chinese Gold Songs Award' in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 因应中国国家广播电视总局的禁令，香港电台于2021年2月12日起停止转播“BBC World Service”频道及节目。
description.en: In response to a ban by the National Radio and Television Administration of China, RTHK ceased relaying the BBC World Service channel and programs from February 12, 2021.

relationships.target: 英国广播公司国际频道

description.zh-cn: 因应中国国家广播电视总局的禁令，香港电台于2021年2月12日起停止转播“BBC World Service”频道及节目。
description.en: In response to a ban by the National Radio and Television Administration of China, RTHK ceased relaying the BBC World Service channel and programs from February 12, 2021.

relationships.target: 中央人民广播电台香港之声

description.zh-cn: 自2017年9月4日起，香港电台第六台全日转播“中央人民广播电台香港之声”。
description.en: Since September 4, 2017, RTHK Radio 6 has been relaying the 'CNR Voice of Hong Kong' 24 hours a day.

description.zh-cn: 通讯事务管理局于2020年3月4日公布，本地免费电视台毋须再播放香港电台的节目。
description.en: On March 4, 2020, the Communications Authority announced that local free-to-air television broadcasters are no longer required to carry RTHK's programs.

description.zh-cn: 香港警务处于2020年8月中旬，结束与港台自1973年起联合制作的《警讯》节目。
description.en: In mid-August 2020, the Hong Kong Police Force ended the co-production of the program 'Police Report' with RTHK, which had been running since 1973.

description.zh-cn: 李百全于2021年3月1日接任广播处长后，成立编辑委员会，多次抽起或停播《铿锵集》、《议事论事》、《香港故事》等具争议性或批评声音的节目，并解雇多名主持人，严重削弱了港台的编辑自主。
description.en: After taking office as Director of Broadcasting on March 1, 2021, Patrick Li established an editorial committee and repeatedly pulled or suspended controversial or critical programs such as 'Hong Kong Connection', 'LegCo Review', and 'Hong Kong Stories'. He also dismissed several hosts, severely undermining RTHK's editorial independence.

description.zh-cn: 李百全于2021年3月1日至2022年6月30日期间担任广播处长。
description.en: Patrick Li served as the Director of Broadcasting from March 1, 2021, to June 30, 2022.

description.zh-cn: 何国栋在1972年获委任为广播处长后，要求新闻报道必须由香港电台负责编采，不再由政府新闻处提供，开启了港台编辑自主的时代。
description.en: After being appointed Director of Broadcasting in 1972, James Hawthorne demanded that news reporting must be handled by RTHK's own editorial team instead of being supplied by the Government Information Services Department, ushering in an era of editorial independence for RTHK.

description.zh-cn: 反修例运动后，香港特区政府加强介入香港电台的管治，控制编采方向，使其逐渐失去报导的中立性并成为官方喉舌。
description.en: After the 2019-2020 Hong Kong protests, the HKSAR government increased its intervention in RTHK's governance, controlling its editorial direction and causing it to gradually lose its neutrality and become an official mouthpiece.

description.zh-cn: 2021年6月18日，香港电台解雇了节目主持人曾志豪。
description.en: On June 18, 2021, RTHK dismissed program host Tsang Chi-ho.

description.zh-cn: 2021年6月18日，香港电台解雇了节目主持人贵花田。
description.en: On June 18, 2021, RTHK dismissed program host Florence Chan.

description.zh-cn: 2021年6月28日，香港电台将《自由风自由phone》节目主持人区家麟撤换。
description.en: On June 28, 2021, RTHK replaced Au Ka-lun as the host of the program 'Free Wind Free Phone'.

description.zh-cn: 2001年，时任特首董建华批评《头条新闻》节目为“低趣味的制作”。
description.en: In 2001, then-Chief Executive Tung Chee-hwa criticized the program 'Headliner' as a 'low-taste production'.

description.zh-cn: 2020年2月，时任警务处处长邓炳强致信广播处长，批评《头条新闻》的“惊方讯息”环节颠倒是非、抹黑警队，最终导致节目被暂停制作。
description.en: In February 2020, then-Commissioner of Police Chris Tang wrote to the Director of Broadcasting, criticizing the 'Ging Fong Message' segment of 'Headliner' for distorting facts and smearing the police force, which ultimately led to the suspension of the program.
